entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_reset_2: This is sub-optimal. However, conditions indicate that you may later resume the assignment without injury.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Federation of the Double Worlds detective seeking to arrest the Drall slicer called
entries.waypoint_description_1: Rendezvous with a representative of a government official who seeks Imperial blaster cannon blueprints secured by the Drall slicer
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: This Drall slicer wanted a Fed-Dub investigator stopped.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Drall slicer who wanted Imperial blaster cannon plans delivered to the representative of a high government official.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_5_2: Why can't your protector just get you released after arrest?
entries.npc_work_2: The matter is entirely clear! Murder the CorSec investigator and patrol officer before I face arrest!
entries.npc_work_1: All stands ready! Deliver the data to my client!
entries.npc_smuggle_1: I gotta get these plans to the boss.
entries.npc_reward_2: You relieve my piercing anxiety. I reward you with commensurate funds.
entries.npc_reward_1: Optimal! I commend your work maximally. Future conditions imply the chance of further employment.
entries.npc_reset_1: This is sub-optimal. However, conditions indicate that you may later resume the assignment without injury.
entries.npc_noloc_2: I now slice into a CorSec database to track the investigator's location. Consult me soon for results.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Datapad problems prevent acquisition of a desirable rendezvous. Check later.
entries.npc_more_1_1: Never you mind. Just understand this -- he's as high as they get around here.
entries.npc_failure_2: You spared the investigator? Oh, I am perturbed! I face arrest and exposure!
entries.npc_failure_1: Oh, entirely sub-optimal! I require another individual to execute successful delivery.
entries.npc_breech_1: You got the data from that slicer?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: The matter is entirely clear! I wish you to murder the CorSec investigator and patrol officer at once!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: All stands ready! Deliver the data to my client!
entries.npc_6_2: I slice! To identify me, name and appearance and DNA and slicing gear, is to destroy me! Stop the investigator!
entries.npc_6_1: Indeed. Not many Drall slice. I hope CorSec believes none do. That is all the better for anonymity for me.
entries.npc_5_2: My client is the Prime Minister. He told all relevant CorSec forces to ignore me. This investigator clearly ignores the directive. Avoid mentioning this to anyone.
entries.npc_5_1: This Imperial Navy report concerns a new Star Destroyer weapon. Interest runs high.
entries.npc_4_2: One is a CorSec data trail specialist. I have sliced his arrest requisition and find he has enlisted a patrol officer as support. Murder them both for my safety!
entries.npc_4_1: I face stern prohibition against naming my client, a high government official. He seeks certain classified Imperial reports as an aid to securing favor of a former Moff.
entries.npc_3_2: I must rely on the protection of my client. I am annoyed and frightened and also anxious.
entries.npc_2_2: This indicates reason for optimism. Destroy the CorSec investigator and accompanying patrol officer.
entries.npc_2_1: Optimal reply. I urge you to take this information to the anonymous representative of my client at a designated unobserved spot. Haste!
entries.npc_1_2: I am alarmed! CorSec investigators have discovered my actions and will soon arrest me. They do not realize I am under protection! I wish you to stop them with fatal force.
entries.npc_1_1: Oh, this is sub-optimal! I face grave problems in delivering certain data to my client. I offer incentive to you to execute this delivery. Agreement?
entries.next: All is currently optimal. I require no assistance.
entries.gotowork_1: I wanted the blaster cannon plans from that slicer called
entries.dontknowyou_1: You're not looking for me, believe me.
entries.cant_work: I struggle with a sub-optimal endeavor that requires assistance, when you are less busy.
